name: Surface: The Noise She Couldn't Make Collector's Edition
name_original: Surface: The Noise She Couldn't Make Collector's Edition
description:
Surface: The Noise She Couldn't Make Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by Elephant Games. It came out on 27-07-2012. Big Fish Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Surface: The Noise She Couldn't Make Collector's Edition is available on PC.
